title: Rewrite $$9$$ in terms of $$3$$

title: Solve for $$x$$
text: Substitution $$3^2$$ into the exponential equation we found before, we get $${\left(3^2\right)}^x=3^1$$. We can simplify this into $$3^{2x}=3^1$$. What is $$x$$?
